data.actual_result: The search doesn't work. You have to close and reopen the filter panel
data.short_description: [Audit Logs] Search function stops working after tabbing out to another app and coming back
data.steps_to_repro: - Access Audit Logs - Tap either Filter by users or Filter by actions - Press Home button of your phone - Open Recent Apps and come back to Discord - Input random letters in the search input
